title: Draw.io Viewer
description: Settings for the Draw.io diagram viewer

background.title: Background
background.description: Background color for the diagram viewer: default (theme), black, white, or custom

customBackgroundColor.title: Custom Background Color
customBackgroundColor.description: Hex color for custom background (e.g., #f0f0f0). Only used when background is set to 'custom'

exportDPI.title: Export DPI
exportDPI.description: Resolution (dots per inch) for PNG export. Higher values produce larger, higher-quality images. Common values: 72 (screen), 150 (draft print), 300 (print quality), 600 (high quality print)

exportBackground.title: Export Background
exportBackground.description: Background color for exported PNG images
